form.title: Submit a Secure Report
form.description: Your information is encrypted and protected. You can choose to remain anonymous.
form.incidentTypeDescription: Select the category that best describes the incident.
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Please describe what happened in detail...
form.descriptionHelp: Provide as much detail as possible about the incident.
form.evidenceDescription: Upload photos, videos, or documents related to the incident.
form.privacyDescription: All uploaded files are encrypted and stored securely. Only authorized personnel can access them.
form.locationPlaceholder: Enter the location where the incident occurred
form.locationDescription: Provide a description of where this happened (e.g., district, city, landmark).
form.enableLocationDescription: Allow the app to capture your exact GPS coordinates.
form.locationActiveDescription: Your precise location will be securely attached to this report.
form.anonymousTooltip: Anonymous reports don't include your personal information, but you won't receive updates.
form.receiveUpdates: You'll receive updates on your report
form.contactDescription: Provide your contact details to receive updates about your report.

success.title: Report Submitted Successfully
success.description: Thank you for your report. It has been submitted securely.
success.trackingNumber: Your report has been assigned a tracking number:
success.anonymousMessage: You've submitted this report anonymously. You can track its status using the tracking number above.
success.contactMessage: You will receive updates about your report via the contact information you provided.

list.title: My Reports
list.description: View and manage your submitted reports
list.noReports: No reports found. Try adjusting your filters or create a new report.
